website_summaries.verdict: A popular board for customers seeking a higher weight capacity with unique styling options.
pros: One of the first hoverboards to handle over 250-pound weight capacity
Offered in pink, black and desert camo
Rides up to 12 miles per hour
Each charge can carry riders up to 7 to 12 miles
cons: Fenders tend to get worn down due to poor design
Enabled app could be higher quality

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails and goes pretty much everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have bought. Both of my daughters love them and recieved them as birthday gifts. (8 & 12 years old) These hoverboards are built rugged, will go over all kinds of terrain, take a beating and retain good battery life. The older of the two boards is approximately 6 months old and hasn't had any issues. (Other than the 8 year old turning it on while it was upside down, which just took resetting to clear up.) Definitely worth the price difference of the standard board.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Day

customer_reviews.title: Board shut down after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because of the reviews being good, my daughter road this several times and loved it. However yesterday, while riding it for about 25 minutes, the board shut down on her. It will not charge and nothing will start on the board, it was fully charged when she took it out. Now it isn't available for an exchange, you'd think a board that costs over $400 should last longer than 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Szydel

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE JUNK. ITS RATED 420 I AM 260. BATTERY LIFE IS 15 MIN. I BET THEY DONT TELL YOU THAT
customer_reviews.text: I would look elsewhere. I have 2 units of T6 and both didnt last more than 1 week. I bought T6 because of 430Ibs rating. I am 260Ibs and battery life is only 15 min. After using it less than 1 hr. It died, green lights flashes 4x times indcating something is wrong. Its built in china. motors get reallly hot after 10 min of my fat azz riding on it. long story short: 2 of them died after 1 week of ownership. really not good stuff. sending it back
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: Roll of the dice as to if it will work or not.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One still works the other quit after a week. Amazon sent me a replacement and the replacement didn't work out of the box. I would think paying $300+ would buy a product that would work out of the box. I will not be buying anymore of this brand. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and both were defective right out of the box. First outreach to customer service line was overwhelmed and was on hold for more than 20 minutes before I finally gave up. Decided to try the chat feauture and spent another 20 minutes recalibrating and finally told that item needed to be sent back to them due to battery warning alarm continuously beeping.....So much for my Saturday afternoon......
customer_reviews.author: Nhung Phan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Support
customer_reviews.text: We received the hoverboard and it works flawlessly! We had one issue after a month, but sincerely appreciation swagtrons swift responses, generous shipping coverage and overall excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: VERAR72787

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome. Bought for my daughter but entire family used it. Easy to learn and well built. Only down side is it is very large and heavy so kids can’t carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Can climb up inclines
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Sturdy. Can climb up inclines. Bought for 8 year old. He loves it. Only thing it's very heavy. But overall it's great!
customer_reviews.author: whitney hampton

customer_reviews.title: Extremely rugged
customer_reviews.text: This was a well researched purchase. The board is used both indoor and outdoor in cold snowy conditions as well as the summer sun. Interface with the app lets you govern speed and experience level settings.
customer_reviews.author: CREEPERMODE

customer_reviews.title: I found it easier and better balanced than the original hoverboards
customer_reviews.text: I found it easier and better balanced than the original hoverboards. The weight and ppwer of Swagtron is a Great Improvement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great hoverboard. Had it for a couple of months now. My daughter rides it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. She learned to ride it very quickly. But she doesn't wear the safety equipment. I told her that if she brakes a leg don't come running to me. LOL She is going to teach me how to ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product. The app to be able to control speed for learning or younger children is great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Not even 30 days old and it is non-functional. And the Swagtron folks are utterly unhelpful and pretty rude.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the coolest thing I've ever owned. Way worth it it's day 2 owning it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ben shafer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT HOVERBOARD!! MY DAUGHTER LOVES THIS THING! Goes in the grass with NO issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fast
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life. Easy to connect to a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lyudmyla Andreyko

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.  Looking for go kart attachment now...
customer_reviews.text: Well... received my board on Wednesday; Friday I was in the ER with 2 broken wrists. Fun, fast, well-constructed. Just BE CAREFUL! Ride it in the house and go from table to countops to walls, etc, to make sure you are stable before you try anything outside! Wear protective gear (wrists, knees, head) while using. Does anyone know if there is a go-kart attachment made especially for this board?
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: This is not a toy. If you fall off at 12 mph like I did you will be hurting for weeks. Please invest in knee pads and elbow pads and a helmet before even thinking of using this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Great for syncing music from your phone while you're riding! There's an app for it that lets you adjust modes and such. May need to recalibrate it after it arrives but other than that, it's been working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: jvkt

product_meta.title: Swagtron Swagboard Outlaw T6 Off-Road Hoverboard
product_meta.description:
Take your swag off-road with the all-new T6 from SWAGTRON! Whether you’re traveling along gravelly mountain roads, skimming across grassy plains, or trekking through muddy terrain, SWAGTRON balance scooter has got you covered.

Ride through your IPX4 rated SWAGTRON T6 off road hover board through puddles of water, and marvel as the aluminum and ABS plastic interior help protect the T6’s internal components. 

The T6’s 10” tubeless tires help provide you with an adventurous ride! Each nylon-infused tire has a number of features including a rugged tread pattern and staggered shoulder blocks for superior traction and grip. You’ll have all the power you need to go over inclines up to 30° and thunder across just about any type of terrain. 

With a superior SentryShield lithium-ion battery, the T6 electric scooter charges in just 2-3 hours; so you’re never far from your next ride into adventure. 

Use the SWAGTRON app to connect to your T6 via Bluetooth so that you can play music directly from your phone and rock out while you ride. A UL2772 certification means that you can ride with confidence, knowing that your electronics are completely protected. 

The T6 motorized scooter comes with a 12-mile range and can reach speeds up to 12 mph (for safety, speed is governed at 7.5 mph). Unlike other electric vehicles, you never have to guess at the battery life. This electric hoverboard comes with a battery indicator as well as turning signals and LED lights directly embedded into the body, so all it takes is one look to check on your T6’s status, making the T6 a great adult electric scooter as well as a kids scooter. 

The T6 hover scooter is a heavy hitter that can also handle heavy loads. The T6 is the first board in the world to handle riders over 250 lbs! Step onto a hoverboard with metal guards that protect your feet and enough power to handle riders of every shape and size. Step up your swag with the SWAGTRON T6.
feature_bullets: FOR ALL RIDERS – The T6 can handle up to 420 lbs., making it the best choice for riders of all shapes and sizes!
ALL TERRAIN - Roll over bumps and inclines up to 30° as you travel through mud, grass, rain, and even gravel.
12 MILE RANGE - The T6 off road hover board has a 12-mile range, and the capability to reach powered speeds of up to 12 MPH.
10" RUGGED TIRES - Dual rugged, 10" tubeless tires designed for all terrain exploration.
ROCK WHILE YOU RIDE –The self-balancing hover scooter uses Bluetooth to play music directly from your phone.
